I can't help but LOL when you first start the game, touch the screen to start and you hear, "Zombie BBQ". Trust me, you have to hear it. Maybe I'm just weird but I am still laughing at it.

The game gets pretty intense.

The first boss is a zombie Granny who throws false teeth at you. LOL!
